author: eptwts
text:
youth unemployment is at an ATH & simultaneously countless of young people are making STUPID money online, which is clearly reflected in whop processing 2 fkn billion

i think if you’re a young guy it has become more & more clear what you should be doing to make it in our generation...

the typical college -> corporate 9 to 5 route is no longer as safe/appealing as it once was

i really fw whop & the team behind it because they’re serving the misfits who are looking for & finding creative ways to avoid this uncertain traditional path

been bullish since before it hit the billions & still am very bullish
